lead_paragraph: BERRIGAN--Daniel. The law firm of Kellner Herlihy Getty & Friedman mourns the passing of Daniel Berrigan, S.J. We were proud to represent him and his fellow members of the West Side Jesuit Community for many years. "Start with the impossible. Proceed calmly towards the improbable." 1/3
